Blockchain Accelerator Machin $BAM

$BAM is a Massive Open Online Course 100% produced in spanish intended to teach junior developers the abilities needed to contribute to the ethereum ecosystem in latin america. This project is oriented to promote the use and adoption of the Ethereum network by giving junior developers the basic technical knowledge needed to dive into the Etheremâ€™s development community.

Supported by EF's ecusystem supoprt program.
